Juniors & Parties

PLEASE NOTE: All drivers require a Balacalava for hygeine reasons. Feel free to bring your own, or we can supply them for £1.50 each.

Kids' Birthday Parties

This is a private party package for up to 8 drivers 8 years and older.

Kids' Birthday Parties Include:

  • 3 x 15 minutes racing sessions for the birthday boy/girl
  • 2 x 15 minute sessions for the guests
  • Hot meal and squash in the private corporate room
  • Pizza, chicken nuggets, burger or hot dog with chips
  • Orange/blackcurrant squash
  • Medal presentation plus a trophy for the birthday boy/girl

  • 2 Hour Session with Food

    1 Hour Racing, 1 Hour Food & Medals

    £240up to 8 drivers

1 HOUR RACE / FAMILY SESSION

Our 1 hour non-stop private sessions are perfect for parties and families looking for a great night out. This is a private party package for up to 8 drivers 8 years and older.

No food, trophies or medals are included but can they be purchased at extra cost.

  • 1 Hour Session

    1 Hour Non-Stop Race

    £240up to 8 drivers

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Biz karts for Corporate & Group Parties, and Sprint karts for our arrive & drive sessions. We also have Go-Karts for kids.
